mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFUSERGROUPID, t1.WFUSERGROUPNAME FROM T_SRFWFUSERGROUP t1
SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFUSERGROUPID`, t1.`WFUSERGROUPNAME` FROM `T_WFUSERGROUP` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFUSERGROUPID, t1.WFUSERGROUPNAME FROM T_WFUSERGROUP t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFUSERGROUPID AS WFUSERGROUPID, t1.WFUSERGROUPNAME AS WFUSERGROUPNAME FROM T_SRFWFUSERGROUP t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFUSERGROUPID AS WFUSERGROUPID, t1.WFUSERGROUPNAME AS WFUSERGROUPNAME FROM T_SRFWFUSERGROUP t1
SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFUSERGROUPID], t1.[WFUSERGROUPNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFUSERGROUP] t1
